commits.author: Michael McCandless
commits.sourceNew:
/** Releases exclusive access. */
  public abstract void close() throws IOException;
commits.sourceOld:
/** Releases exclusive access. */
  public abstract void release() throws IOException;

commits.author: Robert Muir
commits.sourceNew:
/** * Releases exclusive access. *

* Note that exceptions thrown from close may require * human intervention, as it may mean the lock was no * longer valid, or that fs permissions prevent removal * of the lock file, or other reasons. *

* {@inheritDoc} * @throws LockReleaseFailedException optional specific exception) if * the lock could not be properly released. */ public abstract void close() throws IOException;
commits.sourceOld:
/** Releases exclusive access. */
  public abstract void close() throws IOException;
